1. Installing PyCASSE¶

1.1. Pre-requisites¶

  • Install dependencies:

    $ pip install -r requirements.txt

1.2. Optimization Solver¶

1.2.1. Gurobi¶

PyCASSE uses Gurobi [Gurobi] for solving mixed integer programs (MIP).

  • Install Gurobi
  • Setup Gurobi Python Interface for Python Users
  • Get a Gurobi license
    • Faculty, students, or staff of an academic institution might be eligible for a free academic license

1.3. PyCASSE¶

  • Download or clone the PyCASSE-git repository:

    $ git clone https://github.com/descyphy/pycasse

  • Navigate to PyCASSE-git folder where setup.py is located

  • Install PyCASSE:

    $ pip install .

You are now ready to use PyCASSE!
